text: Is there a way to create type asserts for arrays/vectors with fixed lengths? It isn't a static property but I'd like to avoid explicit checking at runtime of possible

elements.text: Is there a way to create type asserts for arrays/vectors with fixed lengths? It isn't a static property but I'd like to avoid explicit checking at runtime of possible

text: Can we cross post this publicly to <https://discourse.julialang.org|Discourse> for further visibility? React with :bridge: on the message above to approve. <https://github.com/JuliaCommunity/SlackBridge/blob/main/README.md#faq|More info here>

Success, it has been cross posted <https://discourse.julialang.org/t/56502| to Discourse>. Keep and eye out on Discourse for responses and please add an answer there once you are satisfied with the solution so others can benefit as well. Happy debugging!
